mapper.insert: insert into m_user (id, username, avatar, email, password, status, created, last_login) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update m_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, username, avatar, email, password, status, created, last_login from m_user
